alert.note: Alert for Garfield (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 06 at 6:41PM MDT until July 06 at 7:45PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: The National Weather Service in Glasgow has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Garfield County in northeastern Montana... * Until 745 PM MDT. * At 641 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 14 miles southwest of Sand Springs, or 35 miles east of Winnett, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Garfield County. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
